title: The All-New 3D Printed fizik Aliante Adaptive
content:
fizik has expanded its 3D-printed saddle offering with the introduction of the Aliante Adaptive, available in R1 ($299.99) and R3 ($259.00) models.

Designed for riders seeking all-day comfort, the Aliante Adpative features a waved profile which provides a gradual, tapered transition from wing to nose. With a slightly wider platform to support the ischial bones, the design improves stability and weight distribution during extended endurance rides.

fizik’s Adaptive 3D-printed padding has now expanded to the Aliante family, creating a platform for riders who demand exceptional, long-lasting comfort. This new incarnation has a flatter surface which allows for a more even spread of pressure and balanced feel; traits which are especially useful for long days in the saddle.

Size Specs:

  • SIZE 145 mm
  • Length: 275mm
  • Width: 145 mm
  • Height at 75mm width: 45 mm
    Length from nose to 75mm width: 141mm
  • Weight: 196g
  • Rail: 7×9 mm

 

  • SIZE 155 mm
  • Length: 275mm
  • Width: 155 mm
  • Height at 75mm width: 45 mm
  • Length from nose to 75mm width: 137 mm
  • Weight: 201g
  • Rail: 7×9 mm

£299.99 / $299.99 / €299.00

R3
